DESCRIPTION: Ensures the process of quantification and verification of associated environmental values, avoided emissions and carbon capture, in preparation for the valuation and transaction of environmental assets.
SESSIONS_PLACEHOLDER: Select a device to see it's sessions
CZARCO_DESCRIPTION: Cooperative (community) and competitive (individual) game to reduce the carbon footprint of school mobility.
BIKE_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Bike sharing initiative designed to provide convenient and eco-friendly urban transportation aiming to reduce congestion, lower emissions, and promote healthier lifestyles while enhancing overall urban mobility.
CAR_FLEET_DESCRIPTION: Forward-looking project focused on transitioning a vehicle fleet to electric power. By replacing traditional vehicles with electric cars, aims to reduce emissions, lower operational costs, and promote sustainable transportation solutions.
SOLAR_PANEL_DESCRIPTION: Community-driven solar panel project aimed at harnessing clean and renewable energy, aims to create a resilient energy infrastructure while fostering energy independence and a reduced carbon footprint.
NAME: Name
ACCEPT_TERMS_1: I have read and agree with the
INSTRUCTIONS: You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.
BASELINE_DECRIPTION_1: represents the fossil fuel-powered vehicle. The
BASELINE_DECRIPTION_2: represents the number of vehicles for comparison (e.g., if the fleet is 1, then 1 baseline vehicle is compared to 1 project vehicle). The
BASELINE_DECRIPTION_3: driven represents the average distance driven per day and per vehicle (e.g., if the fleet is 2 and the distance driven is 25Km, it means that, on average, each vehicle does 12,5Km/ day)
PROJECT_DECRIPTION_1: represents the electric vehicle chosen to replace the baseline vehicle (fossil-fueled vehicle). The
PROJECT_DECRIPTION_2: represent the number of full charges needed per day to achieve the distance-driven selected
TIMEFRAME_DESCRIPTION: The timeframe is used to project the number of carbon credits possible to obtain in a period of 3, 6 ,9 or 12 months

ERRORS.ERROR_CANT_BE_EQUAL: The new password should not be the same as the current password.
ERRORS.ERROR_NEW_ALFA: The new password must have at least 1 alphanumeric character, 1 number, 1 lowercase letter and 1 uppercase letter.
ERRORS.ERROR_NEW_8: The new password must be at least 8 characters long.
ERRORS.ERROR_NEW_80: The new password must be less than 80 characters.
